Articles.Content: Universe Sandbox is a sandbox simulator of Newton Physics, with features like collision and tidal heating and tidal disintegration and black holes and supernovae and climate and celestial bodies' inner structure and so forth, and supports VR. They are hiring a spacecraft physics developer on the website (is it expired?). If they successfully add the feature, which do you think is better, Universe Sandbox2 or KSP? (Universe Sandbox is in its "2nd" state, like the coming KSP2.)

On 5/17/2020 at 7:24 AM, AllenLi said:

collision and tidal heating and tidal disintegration and black holes and supernovae

'Ol GrayStillPlays sure exemplifies this in his videos
